title: Mango mousse
ingredients: ['1 kg (2 lb 4 oz) fully ripe mangoes', '100 ml (3½ fl oz) sweet white wine or water', '1 tablespoon clear honey', 'Grated zest and juice of ½ lemon', 'Juice of 1 large orange', '1 teaspoon orange flower water, optional', '2 egg whites', '2 tablespoons caster sugar']
